about.details:
Incorporated in 2008, Containe Technologies Limited (CTPL) is engaged in the business of Automobile Safety and GPS solutions in the Automobile Sector. The company manufactures a wide range of technology-intensive electronic and mechanical automotive products.

Containe Technologies Limited is an ISO 9001:2015 certified organization engaged in the business of Design, Development, Manufacturing, Supply & Service of Electronic Speed Limiting Devices and GSM/GPRS/GPS/IRNSS based Communication & Controlling Vehicle Location Tracking Devices, Marketing & Sales of IoT Devices & Lithium Ion Battery Operated 2- wheeler & 3-wheeler Auto Rickshaw.

The company is manufacturing electronic Speed Limiting Device (SLD), "MOTOREYE & LIMITS" Brand Electronic Fuel Regulator & Pedal Interface, suitable for the latest Vehicle of BS-IV Standards to the Oldest Vehicles.

Containe Technologies Limited have one manufacturing unit at Marriguda, Secunderabad, Hyderabad. The company's products are mainly sold through distributors and dealers.

faqs.question: What is the Containe Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Containe Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 1744000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹2.62 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹15 per share. The minimum order quantity is 8000.

The IPO opens on September 20, 2022, and closes on September 22, 2022.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Containe Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Containe Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Containe Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Containe Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Containe Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Containe Technologies IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Containe Technologies IPO opens on September 20, 2022 and closes on September 22, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Containe Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: Containe Technologies IPO lot size is 8000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Containe Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Containe Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Containe Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Containe Technologies IPO will be done on Tuesday, September 27, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 29, 2022. Check the Containe Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Containe Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Containe Technologies IPO listing date is on Friday, September 30, 2022.
